caption:
I lost “motivation” in 2022.

But when you’ve reached all your goals, and the work doesn’t stop you have to learn to rely on DISCIPLINE.

But in May of 2023, I was honest enough to admit my self discipline had fallen off the wagon too (for good reason but that’s a whole ‘nother post). 

So for me, the past 7 months and now into 2024,  I’m not focused on any new goals, creating new habits, nor a fitness goal.

I’m focused on doing HARD things.

I’m focused on physical and mental self discipline, especially in areas where the world would view it as “optional.”

I’m focused on immediate forgiveness  regardless of whether that person is repentant. 

I’m focused on creating unforgettable memories with my family. I want my LOVE for them to live LONGER than my physical presence ever could. 

I’m focused on sacrificing comfort for bigger future wins no matter what it may look like externally. 

I’m focused on being perfectly content without a “theme” for this year… but instead just keeping my head down and letting the work speak for itself. 

May God be Glorified in it all. 

#2024 #blacklawyers #Fitness #Motivation #MomLife
